Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.22491685] 13% hemolysis at 100 μg/ml , 17% hemolysis at 200 μg/ml , 18% hemolysis at 300 μg/ml , 18.5% hemolysis at 400 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.22491685] The cell viability of HaCaT cell lines is 76%, 62% and 53% at peptide concentrations of 50, 100, 200 μg/ml. In Kunming mice, the LD50 of OH-CATH30 is 120 mg/kg for i.p. injection, while those of pexiganan(control 1) and PMB(control 2) are
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria, Antifungal activity agaist Candida albicans

Literature.Title: Efficacy of OH-CATH30 and Its Analogs against Drug-ResistantBacteria In Vitro and in Mouse Models
